reviews.title: more surface for projects
reviews.review_text: It is much larger than a standard "TV tray", so it offers a lot more surface for projects and artwork. It stands pretty sturdy with minimal wobbliness. I haven't used it to eat off of, but it works as a next to the bed/chair table, with a good variety of heights and that can easily be put away. I have a very small space to work with at the moment, so I find this works great!

reviews.title: Best table buy
reviews.review_text: Great Price extra space compared to other trays works good for a temporary desk. I use for projects and as a table to eat Infront of tv so many uses. easy to clean and durable. Also, light weight so easy to move and set up also can adjust for three different Hights and locks in place

My son just came home from the hospital and needed a table because he is stuck in bed for a while and there is no putting anything together, It comes fully assembled and it is very sturdy He has a ton of stuff on it right now and I wouldn't be afraid to put a TV on it I thought it was a little pricey at first until I seen how sturdy and how well it was made

I would highly recommend this folding table over any folding table or eating table tray. The length and width of the table is double in size of your normal eating tray. I use it to work off of with my tablet in books. I have another one that I use to eat off of as well. Again, I highly recommend it.

it's wonderful it's big enough to do what you need to do and it's pretty sturdy and I'm not sure colors would be nice but at least black is neutral I can do my diamond painting on it My small ones so that's nice it's pretty sturdy and pretty strong! so I'm perfectly happy with it!

reviews.title: Excellent all-purpose small foldable table
reviews.review_text: This table does exactly what I purchased it to do. It is lightweight, easy to assemble (intuitive) and fold. I needed it as an all purpose, easy to move, table for crafts, cooking, and as a flat surface when I'm at my computer. All these functions have worked out perfectly. I am very pleased with this purchases, especially as I bought it on line without "seeing" it in action.

reviews.title: Sturdy and Adjustable Snack Tables
reviews.review_text: These are very sturdy and adjustable snacktables. The tray is larger than the standard wooden folding snack table. I replaced a set of the old light wood tables for these nice, large black tables. These Mainstay snack tables are lighter and fold up thinner than the wooden tables so they are easier to store. I recommend these tables for anyone looking for one.

reviews.title: Mainstays 26" Adjustable Folding Table Is Great
reviews.review_text: I saw this table at a friend's who, after owning for a few months, highly recommended. I ordered a couple of tables for myself. I love that there are several heights it can be adjusted (very easily) to. It is so very lightweight that it is easy for even a disabled elderly person to carry 2 at a time. They fold up very slim and that makes it easy to tuck away for storage. The thing that caught my eye in the first place was the large table . . . bigger than normal TV Tray.

Recently, I purchased a table from Walmart. It is a fantastic extra table to have in your house. It's just a bit larger than a TV tray and that extra amount of room makes it so so much easier to use. The one move application to make it go up or down Makes it easy to do even with a child on your hip. Great buy for any family or a single person. Could even sub substitute as a desk.

reviews.title: Bad design of legs that are massive %26 long bulky
reviews.review_text: It's a good size table when horizontal but the way the lake stand it would get in the way of almost anything around you. Annoying. Tall, wide, but legs so wide hard to get close to it if sitting on any furniture. (I used it for eating from couch or snacking, legs banged into couch making that impossible).

reviews.title: sturdy and q
reviews.review_text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I'm in a wheelchair so it serves me well for breakfast, lunch and dinner table. Also I do jigsaw puzzles, Word Searchs, and Adult Coloring Books. My son and daughter-in-law set up the 2nd one as a Coffee Station.

reviews.title: Great for all around the house.
reviews.review_text: I love the size and ability to raise/ lower according to my needs. It's lightweight yet sturdy. It folds up fairly thin and is easy to hide under the couch, bed or in a closet. I wish this came in other colors. Black may be basic, but a nice neutral tan color would be fantastic. I once found one in a lime green ðŸ’š color. It went home with one of the nibblings. It works great for a quick computer ðŸ’» stand.

reviews.title: Light weight, adjustable
reviews.review_text: Adjusts to several heights making it great for chairside use. Perfect size for playing cards, sorting items, etc. Do not use it to steady youself or to push up from a chair as it's not that sturdy. A great foldable storage table that is easy to adjust. Comes ready to use.

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.review_text: This is super handy and sturdy enough for my purposes -- mainly working on quilt projects while watching TV. I have drawn diagonal lines for dozens of half-square triangles on it already. Really convenient near my chair. I dinged it one star because it arrived from the store unwrapped and has an ugly gouge on the top, likely from being jostled in the truck.

reviews.title: Crafty Table
reviews.review_text: I bought this for simple crafts and it's the perfect size to fit next to my desk plus there's three different height sizes to choose from which is handy for different sitting positions. It's wider than a tv tray normally is which helps too. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Computer table that's versatile
reviews.review_text: I really like this computer table it's easy to set up and it's folds great for storage. I also use it for lunch as a dining table . This is very versatile and easy and light to carry. It dual uses if you need a table as a senior it's very light and you can easily eat a snack on it..

reviews.title: Folding tray table
reviews.review_text: Good sturdy folding tv/bedside table but can't fit legs underneath well. Top is nice and big and adjustable height works good. Lightweight for ease of moving.

reviews.title: Great tables!
reviews.review_text: I have several of these to use around the house They are useful for many different projects,,as well as using for meals in front of TV. They fold up easily and don't take up much space in closet. They are easy to keep clean.

reviews.title: great table
reviews.review_text: second of these I have bought...my other one is a few years old and is still in service. very adjustable for many uses and fold down nicely for storage

This was the second one the I bought because my housemate kept â€œborrowingâ€œ mine. They have more room than a traditional tray table. We mostly use them to eat on in the living room. They easily fold up to stow away.

reviews.title: Lightweight small table, sturdy and useful.
reviews.review_text: Sturdy and easy to set up. A useful item for niche requirements, in the home or office. I am a vendor at a big weekly outdoor market, and this nicely supplements my main display table.

reviews.title: Great table
reviews.review_text: I got this table as an ironing table for my sewing room. I work on projects on it and I put an ironing pad down %26 iron on it. It works great in this capacity %26 is very sturdy %26 durable. Great product for a great price.
Handy little pop up table, got it for my laptop while I was traveling. Ended up being a cooktop, tool bench and mini desk. Easy to put up, takes up minimal space when folded up.
I wish I bought this table a long time ago, i wouldn't have lift my furniture all over the place for a desk .... this is so convenient so light you can carry it anywhere I will make great use of it.
I love it because I use it when I need a small table/desk to complete some things at home. It's light but sturdy and easy to open and close and put away when I'm not using it.

reviews.title: Priced Right and Useful
reviews.review_text: I love this table, I have three. One is used for my plants to get more sun by the window. One is multi-purpose and another I use as a table to mix my essential oils. There are so many ways to use these tables plus they are economicalâ€¦.

reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, sturdy and I like the shape. It hangs over the edge of my Mattress a lil, so I can put a tv on and I use the backside of it for a dressing table

reviews.title: Best ever folding table
reviews.review_text: These are great tables. Bigger than normal TV tray tables. Adjustable height. very sturdy. I own 7 or 8 of these, some I bought 15 years ago. The oldest is starting to show it's age around the edges, but still going strong.

I first picked up this table in SC for when i visit my daughter. Liked it so much I bought another one for my house. Easy to put up and adjust the height. It's sturdy, I haven't put anything heavier than my 16 in Gaming laptop.

reviews.title: Very handy!
reviews.review_text: This table is lightweight but sturdy %26 sleek. We use it as a tray table in front of the couch to eat on while watching TV. It collapses easily with a lever so no pinched fingers. It wipes clean easily. Ideal for crafting too.

i liked the sturdiness and beung able to adjust height..Doesnt look special.It just does its job of being to have my lunch or laptop on it and not have to worry about it wobbling or collapsing out of nowhere or when somebody walks by it.

reviews.title: Sturdy and Lightweight
reviews.review_text: Live this! Bought one as a TV tray for myself.. Bought another one 6 months later for my 96-year-old mother to put her iPad and book she's reading at the time. It is sturdy and lightweight.

reviews.title: Oversized tray table
reviews.review_text: Purchased as a quick extra bedroom table for guests to use when visiting. Wipes down quick and folds away into the closet. Has a Velcro strap to keep legs together when closed. Extra large tray table.
This isn't my first time purchasing a table like this. Its actually my fourth. These are excellent tables not only as tv trays, but great for doing crafts.

reviews.title: buy it Sturdy and easy to adjust
reviews.review_text: Sturdy and easy to adjust height. It is perfect for a laptop with a notebook next to it. It has a cool intentional bent legs on one side to give room for knees
A nice size tray able to hold a decent amount. Tray is light but sturdy. Can hold decent weight. Very handy to have around to fill temporary table needs
This is my third one. first one I had for 10 years. They are sturdy and large enough for eating, using the laptop, and even crafts. I love the size of them.

reviews.title: Great table for various uses
reviews.review_text: I needed a table for my CPAP machine near my bed. This is perfect. It came already assembled and is large enough to hold my machine plus additional items. The adjustable height is great and it's very stable. I'm buying another one for my husband to keep by his small desk for extra space. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: A waste of money!
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about purchasing this adjustable height personal table. However, once I received it and started using it, my expectations weren't met. The table has a hump in the surface, which causes anything placed on it to slide off. As a result, the table is actually of no use to me.

it would be nice if it was a little sturdier. The top is too thin. i had foot surgery that took forever to heal. i had to stay off of it for quite awhile and sat at the table. it's now cracked. i purchased a new one 1 month ago and is starting to not be level. my sons has lasted longer. he uses it to eat 1 meal 6 days per week. 2 one day per week. otherwise its nice. just needs a thicker top.

I had a mainstay folding table for over 10 years. The only problem with it was it only stayed stable on the lowest level...I decided to replace it because it was looking old and worn from constant use and I'm sure glad I did! This new one is made so much better and it stays stable at the highest level.

will surprise you how easy it can be folded up, flat!!!! for easy storage holds well stands straight. I have bought this table in colrs now black, throughout the years several different times for many reasons, never fails to impress love, it, thank you ðŸ˜Š

Love them. So glad they are back after gone. i used to have some in varied colors just like these new black ones. My daughter, now grown up, has the old ones at her apartment. I am enjoying the new ones at my home. Well made. Last a long time.

reviews.title: Ticked all the boxes
reviews.review_text: This dandy little table served its purpose just fine. I needed to display a few flyers and brochures at a health fair where I was presenting. I needed this little table top to be light, easy to transport, easy to set up and take down, and very, very portable. It was all those things. And it looked good too.

This desk is just what I needed to work at home. I use the highest height when using my laptop while sitting on the couch. The top is more spacious than I expected, you can fit a laptop, remote, control, drinks etc on it. I also use it if I want to eat a meal in front of the TV. I find it easy to fold and put away if I need it it is really multifunctional. Glad I bought it.

reviews.title: Folding Table is perfect for my needs
reviews.review_text: I love the size of the table. Easy to use with its 3 height levels. It's working great as an eating table and a crafting table. It's durable but light. Second time buying this item, 1st one burned in a wildfire. So I'm a happy customer 2nd time around!!

I have bought three of these now. I am disabled and use them for chair side tables. Very strurdy and easy to clean. They are light weight and foldable making them easy to move if needed. The surface is large enough for a meal and medicine. I use one for a desk with a lamp attached.

reviews.title: Sturdy little table
reviews.review_text: I use these tables for side tables, computer desk, and for eating in front of the tv. They are very sturdy but lightweight. You don't have to worry about it toppling over like an ironing board, despite the similarities in appearance. I've bought 3 of these and I'll buy a couple more when they get back in stock.

reviews.title: Great choice on my part
reviews.review_text: This table is large enough for my crafts without taking up space around the house. It does everything from sit in front of my couch, next to my bed or just middle of room where I can pull up a chair. The surface is smooth enough to draw or paint on without issue and easy to wipe down or clean. I even use it as my computer stand when I need to and it's easy to take places when I travel. I do wish it went a bit higher though. Over all a great purchase. No regrets.

reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces and Versatile Use!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Mainstays 26" Adjustable Height Personal Folding Table for use in my home office, and I couldn't be happier with it! The table is the perfect size for tight spaces, providing just enough surface area without taking up too much room. The adjustable height feature is a game changer â€“ I can easily switch between sitting and standing positions, making it great for both work and leisure. The table is lightweight yet sturdy, and the folding mechanism makes it super convenient to store when not in use. I love the sleek black finish, which complements my dÃ©cor nicely. It was easy to set up right out of the box, and I've used it for everything from paperwork to crafting. It's durable enough for daily use and can handle a variety of tasks. Overall, a fantastic value for the price, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a compact, adjustable, and multi-purpose table!
The product is exactly as described, the deliver was done by Superman. I ordered them in the morning and was using them at 3:00 pm. I did not expect to have Amazon like service. A-Ma-Zing!!
This tray is roomy and suitable for a variety of uses. I'll use the item as my go to work table as it's easy to transport around the house. This was a good buy.

reviews.title: BUY IT! DO IT! YOU WONT REGRET IT!
reviews.review_text: this is the perfect side table/tv table/desk. My 1st one lasted 5 years, with lots of daily use. I just bought my 2nd one, and i love it more, only because i like the color better
I love these. I bought 4 of them. You can set them to different heights, sturdy, One of them I bought is for our microwave, and we keep our air fryer on top of the microwave. Great table!

sturdy great for laptop and mouse use this is the second one i purchased first one has held up for 4 years not heat or scratch resistant same ware from use but will recommend to purchas one if i had to choose over wood or aluminum brands

reviews.title: Easily fold up
reviews.review_text: I love this table for work. It's not too small and just the right size to fit in a small corner but still has enough room to place multiple items. Not too heavy to carry. Easily folds up and placed in a convenient corner.

reviews.title: adjustable table
reviews.review_text: we have three of these tables in our house they are great because they have three different sizes once the table is set up so you can have a tall table or a very short table depending on whether you're sitting on a chair or the couch or the floor. the only downside is it is a very slippery table things slide off very easily

reviews.title: Favorite foldout
reviews.review_text: Favorite table. Other foldouts Iâ€™ve had were clunky and instantly showed any stain. I appreciate how think the table on this is, which makes it easy to fold and stow away, as well as easy to pick up and move around the room. The legs slope in on one side so my knees arenâ€™t constantly bumping the frame. I got my first one as a hand me down from my dad, and Iâ€™ve repurchased since, only to get one that wasnâ€™t scratched up. Both still work great. Itâ€™s a bummer you canâ€™t order it online, but it was worth goin to a store for it.

reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to set up
reviews.review_text: The trays are easy to set up and take down. They are portable and easy to store when not in use. They are lightweight. The only negative thing is that the top scratches very, very easily. and one scratched, you can not buff it out or even sand it out...the scratch is permanent! I have six of thats now, and all of them have deep scrathes or gouges, ALL from jyst normal usage.

reviews.title: Durable, Convenient, Multi-functional mini table
reviews.review_text: I love this table. Easy to Assemble and Disassemble. Durable, Convenient, Compact and Multi-functional. I use it for computer work, portable writing desk, tv tray, and even small events to set up a mini table. Definitely recommend if you are looking for something that you can pull up to a chair, bed and/or anywhere you sit and need a quick and easy workspace.

reviews.title: Amazing Portable Table
reviews.review_text: I have 4 of these. They are just amazing for the price. They are sturdy, the height is adjustable, and they are a great size. They make a great portable desk for a laptop. They work as a TV tray, they work as a crafting table. I had to buy more because my cats love to lay on them. They lay on them next to my recliner like it's their kitty couch. I have a folded blanket on them. I still have my first one that I bought in 2019. It has a few scratches, that's the only sign of wear. It even held up my heavy gaming computer. Buy this!

reviews.title: Awesome trays
reviews.review_text: I bought this tray for an extension to my computer desk. I had plenty of room for my monitor, keyboard and mouse.....along with the TV remote, plus room left over. It's made well and is adjustable for height. The only problem I had was I couldn't put my feet under the table, which was uncomfortable for me. I will definitely keep these trays. They can be used for many things. They are very sturdy and well made. This is a super nice tray.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: This is the only TV tree you'll ever need it just Heights, which is great when you wanna just eat off of it or if you want to use it as an end table, very durable durable this is the only TV tree you'll ever need it just Heights, which is great when you wanna just eat off of it or if you want to use it as an end table, very durable durable and steady

reviews.title: Great little tables!
reviews.review_text: I used 2 of these to help with being part of the backstage crew at a local playhouse. Worked out great. I clipped a book light on each one , and had enough space for needed items without getting in the way of the cast. Going to use them again for a future production for which I'm the stage manager.

reviews.title: Folding Work Table under $20! Excellent Deal!
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for a small laptop and cuppa tea for those working from home, or doing online school. It's a large surface and it is super sturdy. It will hold plenty of weight, maybe don't sit on it, but definitely your laptop, a plate of food, etc will hold up just fine. I also love that the height can go up or down. For under $20 this is a steal and I would highly recommend for those needing a folding work table.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
reviews.review_text: The folding table is very sturdy and can be used in so many different ways... it really comes in handy. I noticed one customer complained about legs being bent. This is not a defect, but a plus. The legs on one side are very slightly bent so as to allow for some knee room when it is used as table or desk. it is not detract from the functionality, that adds to it.

reviews.title: YES! WORTH THE MONEY! GO BUY IT
reviews.review_text: it fits my laptop, keyboard, computer mouse and pad, and has room for other things like placing a quick snack nearby if you cant leave your computer. it is adjustable in height and super cheap and light weight as well as durable! no need to buy a fancy $100 computer desk guys!! this is more than what you think! and it folds up for easy storage! even the photo sticker on the product showed a laptop sitting on it with extra room. i love this and may get 1 more just because it is such a great product for me!

reviews.title: Nice little sturdy side table for outdoors!
reviews.review_text: My husband and I bought this table to go between two outdoor chairs on the patio. Itâ€™s perfect for that space! I love that itâ€™s adjustable in height as well. I never wouldâ€™ve known this little table existed at Walmart, had it not been for the customer in front of us at the checkout in the garden center. He had it in his cart and at the last minute he decided to not buy it, so the cashier just set it next to his register. When we got to the cashier, I asked him how much the table was and it was affordable so I said Iâ€™ll take it! Now Iâ€™m buying one for my daughter and her husbandâ€™s porch to go between their two chairs.

reviews.title: Virtual School Must
reviews.review_text: Living in a relatively small home, we donâ€™t have room for a full size desk however my children are older and donâ€™t want to sit at our dining room table to do homework so we had to find a solution and this is it. This table is sturdy enough to hold a laptop without tipping or collapsing and is large enough to also hold a mouse, snack, water bottle, paper, pencil- whatever my son needs. At the end of the day it is easy to fold up and move out of the way. This table is extremely affordable and would be great for any area in your house, camping, outdoor use, etc. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: great foldable work table
reviews.review_text: this table is fairly sturdy (I wouldnt put all my weight on it or anything) it easily holds my full sized laptop with plenty of room to use my mouse and still has room behind to set my headset and a drink on it. its perfect for working at home when I need to. I like that I can fold it away when I dont need it to save space. I saw another review stating itwasn'tt level and this concerned me but I haven't had any issue with that. Mine was delivered in perfect condition as well. I'm very happy with this table overall.

reviews.title: Love these folding tables!
reviews.review_text: I actually ordered 2 of these %26 am so glad I did! They are perfect! 3 easy to adjust heights - 25", 26" %26 28". Lighter weight makes them really easy to set up, take down or move around (I am 77 so this is important to me). Yet when in use they are sturdy %26 steady with no worries about tipping. Ease of handling means convenient for me. Love these!

reviews.title: Useful and Affordable in a Pinch
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for something that is quick and easy to assemble to put your laptop, monitor, small desk or even lunch on, this is it. I would NOT recommend using it around large, playful sheepdogs or toddlers. The construction is a little wobbly. They will up-end everything!! You can collapse this unit rather easily. It will be great for camping.

reviews.title: Perfect for 93 year old mom
reviews.review_text: Bought this as an extra table for mom to use as a puzzle table. It ended up being a tad too small as most puzzles are 18 x 24. And because of the curved design, it only worked out for doing sections of it. But she used it as a tray table, it was light %26 easy to clean. Perfect!

reviews.title: TV Tray Stand
reviews.review_text: Perfect size. I can watch television and eat my food at the same time. This extends space in my small apartment. Easy to unfold.

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: Great service from Walmart. On time as promised. This product design is well thought out and executed. Nice product.
Love these tables. They fit nicely In my camper, are very sturdy and light enough for me to move it place to place.
Love this table â€“ easy to get up and down. Multifunction for me I use it as a craft table and an eating table.

reviews.title: Sturdier than expected
reviews.review_text: I use as a side table at work when needed. Light weight, folds easy and flat. Good to use for people to sign papers on. Height adjustment is perfect.
I love the table I got, because it is the same one I had before that has broken but luckily I was Able to get this new one.
I purchased a table several years ago. it is still in great shape. I decided to purchase a second one to use to do crafts in my RV.

reviews.title: New version vs old
reviews.review_text: I own several of these as the older versions. I like the improvements and additional features. However the older version feels a little sturdier.

reviews.title: Sturdy Useful Table
reviews.review_text: Sturdy table and easy to use - we are using it for projectors at events and it is suitable for that. Folds up nicely and fits in the car.

reviews.title: Great Portable Table
reviews.review_text: This is a lightweight, foldable table which is helpful in a setting up for a mobile need. It's reliable and sturdy in its construction as well.
my family and i use this table for everyday uses and would definitely recommend for customers to buy it.
My granddaughter loves it. She uses it as her do everything desk when she comes to visit. We like that it's sturdy and very easy to wipe clean.
It folds. It travels. It sets up easy. It very stable. I have five kids and four dogs that have tested it. No issues at all!
perfect size table to do some computer work, have beunch or bring to porch for games and projects with mydad

reviews.title: The best small table
reviews.review_text: Great for dinner or to set up your laptop to enjoy a movie. Very light, and waterproof top vs those wooden ones that will warp

reviews.title: A good table if you're on a budget
reviews.review_text: This table is excellent however the steadiness of the table is mediocre. But I would recommend this table for people that are on a budget.
Ugh it is a pain to put up and take down. You also can't sit close because your knees bang into the metal bars.
everything slides off the dam thing it slants. why design a table with curved legs? AND the middle is onle place thats flat set anything anywhere else and it slides off.
this is my second one. im still using the first one from 7 maybe 8 years ago. i think that speaks for its self considering ive used it multiple times of every day of those years.

A bit hard to clean as surface is slightly speckled. Nice light weight. A bit cumbersome to set up right height. I use as an adjustable height surface with a cutting board if I need to sit while doing alot of food preparation.
This little table is great for so many uses. I use it in so many more ways than I originally bought it for. I love how it folds away. It doesn't take up any room at all.

reviews.title: Not a good table
reviews.review_text: Very lightweight table, super easy to use it %26 open / close it, adjust the table's height etc but it's not a strong table so if you put much weight on it then it starts to collapse slowly.

reviews.title: Good inexpensive table
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cheap small table for light use and getting it with my grocery delivery was better than same day Amazon. The table was easy to set up, and if it needs to be stored, it won't take up much space.

reviews.title: Great sturdy table, lightweight, easy to carry
reviews.review_text: This table is sturdy, adjustable, and affordable. Perfect size. I use it for dining, cratfs w the kids, demos at the stores. its lightweight, easy to adjust height, and easy to carry and hide away.

reviews.title: Happy with it!!!!
reviews.review_text: This little little table worked out well when I was having guests for dinner. I used it for overflow of food. It's a great little table and folds up nicely and doesn't take up much room to store it!

reviews.title: Great Table
reviews.review_text: Great portable table very sturdy I currently have 4 books on it each book over 500 pages bug books at that and its a nice size table with my books on it I still have room to write or keep my snacks on there as well. Great quality Table.

reviews.title: POOR delivery service. No table delivered
reviews.review_text: Driver did NOT deliver this table. Driver added another delivery photo from another delivery. Dishonest. Not even the size package to contain a table.

reviews.title: Perfect food prep
reviews.review_text: I am a double amputee and was looking for an adjustable table for food prep. This table is absolutely the perfect table. Also, it's useful for eating on, work table, etc.

reviews.title: Folding table was great
reviews.review_text: The folding table worked great for my son taking online courses. Only disappointment was not a space to put his long legs under the foldable table

reviews.title: Modern look %26 great quality!
reviews.review_text: Excellent quality %26 easy to clean surface. Great design and classy look for a tv tray or small table to place decor on.
I already have one that I've had for a couple of years it's sturdy and very serviceable and easy to **** and take down for storage
Nice sturdy little table I like the adjustable height feature and that it has room on one side for the table to go over the bed.
it fits in the corner so good putting away it doesn't take up no room it fits very snug against the wall

reviews.title: Great deal
reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd table. It is sturdy and easy to use. Easy to set up and move around i use one for a art table and the others for end tables.

It tabletop suits my my immediate size needs. BUT, if it had a different leg and folding closure design that woul allow my legs and feet to go under more comfortably, and have a couple height options it would be BETTER for use.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: Excellent product - very reasonably priced. I use it as a laptop table. Large enough for the laptop, speakers and mouse. The last one lasted me almost 10 years. Light weight, but sturdy - folds up - compact - easy to move and store.
Love that it's easy to use as a side table, TV tray for seniors,. The 3 adjustable heights are so easy to use and it folds up nice and flat. Can't beat the price
Purchased as a side table for quilting retreats. Currently used as a side table to my desk. Game changer. Love the 3 varying heights and the light weight. Size is perfect.

reviews.title: Very useful table
reviews.review_text: Easy setup. Looks nice. Just the right size for what I need. Is a little bit wobbly with heavy items, but great for doing crafts, eating, writing letters etc.

reviews.title: Personal Table
reviews.review_text: This table is sturdy and so versatile. My grandkids use it for a craft table, but it can be used as tray table or a laptop computer table adjustable at any height. Then, when you are finished, it folds up and slips behind a door or under the bed.

reviews.title: Sturdy and light table at good price
reviews.review_text: This table is sturdy and very good size, It is perfect for sitting at a chair and using it as a laptop stand, TV tray, etc. The price is good for a tray this sturdy and stable. It also folds up easily and takes up almost no space in a closet.

reviews.title: Super convenient
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is easily movable to any location of my home. I am an online student and I also work from home and sometimes I just need the extra ability to put my laptop or drinks or anything else from any location of my home.
perfect little table to do my acrylic nails. or use as tv table to eat on. homework. coloring for kids. so easy to fold and unfold. ill be buying another one.
A great dize stand for extra temp space as needed. Grands for virtual laptop school while babysitting, bedside eating when ill great for in camper etc

reviews.title: Stable for what is needed
reviews.review_text: I purchased this small table to use in my grandson's room for his table top record player. It's perfect fit and is quite stable. I do think for the material. It's a little pricey however it will stay put which is saying a lot and a young man's room.

reviews.title: Itâ€™s ok
reviews.review_text: It holds a pretty solid amount of weight my on complaint is itâ€™s not level on itâ€™s highest setting. I bought this to put my portable dryer on and it holds it but my dryer is titled. So it looks a little tacky but it works.
Looks perfect. I was sent 2 tables though. Returned one as I have ordered only 1 table. The Table slightly bent one side. Not sure if it is a design or quality issue.

I bought this little folding table to use for folding laundry. But first, I decided to use it at my husband's pottery sale for wrapping up customers purchases. It held up very well and made a big difference with my efficiency.

reviews.title: Table
reviews.review_text: These tables are great for extra desk space in the office, a laptop desk on the road, or â€œtv dinnerâ€ tables in the family room. I've got 4 of these now because they're decent looking, easy to move around, and very functional.
Smaller than I thought but otherwise its nice. Pretty sturdy, folds up and fits under my bed. can barely fit 6 blocking boards on it. big enough for smaler items.
I purchased this table so to use while working on my cross stitch. My laptop fits perfectly and there is room for me to eat on top of it. Great quality, great price, great item!

reviews.title: This is a winner!
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this table. Surface size is much larger than typical folding table, and the adjustable height feature makes this versatile for many uses. It comes fully assembled which is an added bonus.

love it! so easy to set up and then take down. it's also adjustable at 3 different heights. also love its not heavy and folds flat out of the way when not in use. big enough to play solitare on it also.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: Great tray table. Easy to set up. Love the adjustable heights. Nice large surface for many uses. Perfect for food, desk, printer stand, plants, etc, Strong and sturdy.

reviews.title: Two items delivered with no boxes. Dented, dirty.
reviews.review_text: I had trash can delivered and it was dented and scratched. This table was filthy. I don't know what the heck Walmart is thinking but there were no boxes or packing of any kind. Just items left at door and both were damaged or filthy. Walmart delivery is the WORST.

reviews.title: Nice side table
reviews.review_text: This is the third one I've bought, everyone that uses this at my house loves them, so I give them away. Perfect for eating snacking, crafting, whatever you can come up with. Super sturdy, easy to clean, and it folds up if you need to get it out of the way.

reviews.title: Ok but not for me.
reviews.review_text: The way the legs are is not good. If I go to the side the X brace hits your knees and from the short end you have a support bar running across at floor. The surface area is nice but using it to slide up for a tv dinner or to work on a project, you just have no place for your legs.

reviews.title: Nice as a snack tray
reviews.review_text: I was somewhat unimpressed with the table I am returning it as I wanted to use it as a portable table to use with my laptop it is in my opinion not suitable for that and I wouldn't trust it to use as anything else but a snack tray with no more than 10lbs put on it.

reviews.title: amazon table!
reviews.review_text: You can fit quite a large breakfast spread or a cozy dinner for two. I worry about setting a piping hot kettle onto it as it is plastic, so I'll keep using a trivet. The surface is textured and helps prevent things from sliding if you bonk it. When cleaning i find that the fibers of paper towels gather on the surface, so use a cloth. I'm going to get a second I like it so much!

reviews.title: Provides work space in kitch RV
reviews.review_text: I live in an RV full-time, which I love. However, there's not much counter space. This folding table is just what I needed. It folds flat and is so easy to store as it is only about 1" in width. I can use it next to the stove and have my ingredients on it or the sink for putting dishes on. It's sturdy, good quality and oh so very handy! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
reviews.review_text: This is my second one because I relocated and my other one is still in the state Ive relocated from. The desk part is a very nice size and its sturdy. I leave mine unfolded and setup at all times but I do love how slim it is once its folded down. It makes it easy to store away or behind a couch. THE ONLY REASON I TOOK AWAY A STAR is because of the design of the legs. Im not fond of how it criss crosses and causes me to have to place my feet while using it. But I dont use this desk all the time so I overlook that. Overall its worth the money and I was satisfied.

reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review_text: Last year I became disabled due to a disease similar to RA. I don't have a lot of extra money because I'm unable to work so I ordered this product to sit outside and use as a small patio table. Long story short, I had just received it, I set it up then tripped and fell on top of this side table! Incredibly, it held me. Ive gained a lot of weight during my treatments and to my surprise it stopped me from falling on the pavement. So...money very well spent.

reviews.title: Best occasional tables!
reviews.review_text: i owned one of these tables many years ago bought in store. jt has held up like new all these years so i decided to putchase more online when i signed up for Walmart . Best decision ever. They open ealy and fold just as easy. and they are sttong; can hold many items ot one heavier item. I live their long endurance! Many years later I'm still using the first one. I say buy o e and you will be back for more. So handy and strong at a very reasonable price. Absolutely worth purchasing!
